mapper.update: update WS_CASEINFO set TDHID = #{tdhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BASEINFOXML = #{baseinfoxml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FILEINFOXML = #{fileinfoxml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where WSID = #{wsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select WSID, TDHID, CREATETIME, REMARK, BASEINFOXML, FILEINFOXML from WS_CASEINFO
